entry.title: Climax® Strap-on Purple Ice Dong & Harness set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Climax
Type: Harnesses, Strap-Ons & Attachments
Price: 20.85

Take control with the Climax Strap-On dildo and harness set, a simple and satisfying combination that makes it easy to fulfill all of your fantasies. The adjustable neoprene and nylon harness fits most bodies and is easy to wash after use. The translucent phthalate-free TPE dildo is big enough to please without being overwhelming and features a rounded head for maximum G-spot and prostate stimulation, and can also be quickly cleaned with antibacterial soap and warm water. A sturdy O-ring holds the dildo firmly in place and keeps it perfectly positioned for mutual satisfaction!

Product Description:

  • Rounded dildo head for G-spot or prostate stimulation
  • One size fits most
  • Sturdy O-ring keeps dildo firmly in place
  • 100% waterproof
  • Made of phthalate-free TPE and nylon

Item Dimensions:
Insertable Inches: 7 in. (17.78 cm)
Item Width: 3 in. (7.62 cm)
Item Height: 7.5 in. (19.05 cm)
Item Depth: 3 in. (7.62 cm)
Item Weight: 0.12 lbs (0.0544 kg)

Package Dimensions:
Package Width: 8.25 in. (20.96 cm)
Package Height: 10.5 in. (26.67 cm)
Package Depth: 3.25 in. (8.255 cm)
Packaged Weight: 0.13 lbs (0.059 kg)

Material:
TPE
Nylon

Country of Origin:
China

entry.title: TLC Eve's Harness Strap-On Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: TLC
Type: Harnesses, Strap-Ons & Attachments
Price: 20.85

Product Description:
  • Crotchless design lets you get some while you're givin' it
  • T-back style allows for comfortable wear
  • Includes a realistic 7 insertable inch (17.5 cm) dong with 1.5" inch girth (3.9 cm) and a purple translucent 6 insertable inch (15.5 cm) slimline dong with 1.1 inch girth (2.8 cm)
  • Softer-than-leather material is ultra-flexible
  • Adjustable belt-style harness accommodates up to a 49" (124 cm) waist

Item Dimensions:
Item Width: 1.5 in
Item Height: 7 in

Package Dimensions:
Package Width: 11.25 in
Package Height: 11 in
Package Depth: 3.25 in
